paragraph: Kotori Shigemoto (重本 ことり, Shigemoro Kotori, born 5 October 1996, in Tokushima Prefecture) is a Japanese tarento, fashion model, singer and voice actress. She is a former member and leader of Dream5. She is nicknamed Kotori (ことり). She is currently represented with Gold.
Kotori Shigemoto Official Blog "Kotori no koto." – Ameba Blog (in Japanese)
